---
title: "How To Use TalkeR"
---

This is TalkeR.


```{r, eval = F}
#here is how to use TalkeR

TalkeR::TalkToMe()

```
To correct TalkeR, type 'wrong' and then at the next prompt type the correct response.  To turn TalkeR off type 'bye'.  TalkeR remembers old conversations when you restart them.
